website_summaries.verdict: Although it's let down by its awkward software, the excellent battery life and big, bright screen help make the Huawei Ascend Mate 7 a decent choice for those of you looking for movies and games on the go.
pros: The Huawei Ascend Mate 7 packs a huge battery that keeps going for ages, its screen is bright and bold, the camera is pretty decent and the fingerprint sensor actually works
cons: It's running on an old version of Android, Huawei's software tweaks make it clunky to use and there's loads of bloatware installed as standard

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Hmm this phone I amazing I had a Samsung before not only is this phone fast in my opinion it is easier on my eyes than the Samsung I had before the battery life is amazing and the features are easy to use can't wait for the lollipop update

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING phone
customer_reviews.text: It is simply awesome, after being a Samsung Galaxy Note 3 fan, I got the 2 sim card version of the Note 3 the SM-N9002 but the experience was not good, Then after researching many diferent options on Doubl Sim Double Active phones I bought this one and I LOVE IT. It is just an amazing phone. I wish they come up with a more advance version when the time comes, I stick with this brand for now on.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I have. Price cheap but better than iPhone 6.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Wei Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, but no 4G on T-mobile
customer_reviews.text: First of all, This is a great phone. Loved the phone itself, but had some trouble with accessing 4G. For me, I had to return due to the phone not getting 4G coverage from T-mobile. It only would do HSPA. Even with HSPA, I had trouble downloading MMS, I have to be on wifi to be able to download MMS and group texts. Another issue I had was the slow response time, especially with google maps and such. There was so much delay in loading maps it would some time takes about 5 mins to get going. On the paper the battery is huge, but in real life it barely lasted a day and half.
customer_reviews.author: Usthath

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing

Thanks to everyone involved. Great work.

customer_reviews.text: Item has a known defect in which sim card 2 stops working which is why there is no warranty. Seller refused to cross ship and wanted to leave me without a phone waiting to replace this one which really wont do much good as its a known issue with the LT10 model.

customer_reviews.text: It is a ripoff if you pay such a high price for this mate 7. I have a Chinese friend and he told me the phone will be sold at 2900 RMB(usd 480) in China. So if you wait for a month or so, the price should be dropped:).

customer_reviews.title: i'm glad with it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone for about $580. for the last 2 weeks, i'm glad with it. i just don't believe the experiences is similar to ios, i feel it even faster than my iphone5s. it's not like other android phones. The quality of some apps in play store is a minus but this is not phone maker's fault...consider what i experenced in other andorid phones, i would give this phone a 5 star.... byt the way, its touch id works faster than 5s! i will update the review if the speed go slow like my previous samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Xi

customer_reviews.title: I then found that AT&T had better coverage in my rural area as well as a ...
customer_reviews.text: My Mate 7 worked perfectly with T-mobile when I got it, and indicated 4G connectivity. I then found that AT&T had better coverage in my rural area as well as a better monthly rate, so I switched and the wonderful Huawei works perfectly/stronger with AT&T as well. I have an Apple i6+ which "does" get fine signal for both cell and wifi, but it still is no match for this phone. The Huawei is the best phone I have ever found, and I have tried "many".
customer_reviews.author: Donald L.

customer_reviews.title: Get it, but not for $800 +
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love this phone! Helped me put my trusted Lumia 1520.3 away for now. I only paid $598 for on another website and it was well worth it and it came with a flip case. I don't get LTE, but I'm with Tmobile and even my LTE phone never got more than 5-7Mbps so HSPA + speeds. This phone does HSPA + the same as the LTE speeds I was getting. I don't even care if they come out with a USA version with 4g.

customer_reviews.text: Way too many dollars for this phone, considering the competition. Huawei may be an unfamiliar name in the USA, but it is the third largest phone manufacturer in the world. Not exactly a "no name" Chinese company.

You can get a iPhone 6 plus cheaper. Huawei, if you want to sell these phones you have to be around the $300 dollar range.

product_meta.title: Unlocked 4G Huawei Ascend Mate7 MT7-TL10 6.0 inch EMUI 3.0 Smart Phone Hisilicon Kirin 925 8 Core RAM 3GB ROM 32GB Dual SIM FDD-LTE WCDMA GSM - International Version No Warranty
product_meta.description:
General
Brand: Huawei Ascend Mate7
CPU: Kirin 925 8 Core, 4x1.8GHz + 4x1.3GHz + 1x230MHz
OS System: EMUI 3.0
SIM: Dual SIM Micro SIM Card, Nano SIM Card
RAM: 3GB ROM:32GB
External memory: Support TF card up to 128GB (not included)
Sensor:G-sensor, Proximity sensor, Acceleration sensor, Gyroscope, compass
Language: English
Additional Features : NFC, App Cener, Clock, Browser, E-mail, Camera, Gallary, Calendar, Map, Calculator, etc

Network
type: WCDMA, GSM, FDD-LTE
Band: Band (4G): FDD-LTE: Band1/3,Band (3G): WCDMA 850/900/1900/2100MHz, Band (2G): SIM 1: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz, SIM 2: GSM 900/1800/1900MHZ.
Bluetooth:V4.0
WIFI: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ with Wi-Fi support GPS

Display
6.0 inch TFT, 1920x1080 pixels IPS Screen
Screen Color :16M
Front Camera: 5.0MP
Back Camera: 13MP, 1080p video recording/1080p video playback, F2.0
Video recording :Yes

Media Format
Audio: MP3, AAC, MIDI, WMA, AMR, AAC+, etc.
Video: MOV, RMVB, H.263, H.264, MPEG-4, ASF, RM
Pic: PNG, BMP, GIF, JPEG, etc.

Connectivity
1 x Micro SIM card slot;1 x Nano / Micro SD card slot; 1 x Micro USB v2.0; 1 x 3.5mm Earphone port

Battery
Type: Undetachable, Li-polymer Battery in 7.9mm body
4100mAh Battery
Talk time: 28 h(3G), Standby time: 750 h

Dimensions & Weight
Size: 157mm x 81mm x 7.9mm Weight:185g (including the battery)

Package
1xPhone 1xData Cable 1xPower Adapter 1xEarphone
feature_bullets: Huawei Aschend Mate7, Model: MT7-TL10 Gold International Phone.
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, NOT compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Make sure your carrier supports the bands of this model.
Cellular bands: 3G HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 , 4G LTE2100 (B1), TD-SCDMA2000, TD-SCDMA1900, TD-LTE2600 (B38), TD-LTE2500 (B41), TD-LTE2300 (B40), TD-LTE1900 (B39)
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
